Topic.Title: unable to create new games - delete my account?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

I am taking a class that uses Quest. I created an account but may have done something wrong. I can create Squiffy games and they show up on the "My Games" page of the "Create" section. When I try to create a Quest game, I can get into the editor and make changes, but the game never shows up on the "My Games" page. I have tried removing the "login with Google" from my profile but that did not fix it. I have tried another computer and another browser, but the problem is still there.

If there is not a simple answer to this problem, I would like to delete my account to free up the email address, so I can try creating the account again. Can this be done?
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: If nothing else, just create a new account and stop using the old one.
Posts.HTML: If nothing else, just create a new account and stop using the old one.

Posts.EditableText: PM  me to confirm and I can delete your account.
